layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x134
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x134
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x110
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 328x18
          text run at (0,0) width 328: "In this test, the TBODY text should be left aligned."
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 180x76 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {thead} at (1,1) size 178x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 178x22

                text run at (2,2) width 170: "This text is in the THEAD"

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 178x22
